note:
"The silence of good people is more dangerous than the oppression & cruelty by the bad"

Trying to do my little part while striving to find hope in a world which feels like a slow motion video I can only helplessly watch as our selfishness & basest emotions get used by the powerful to divide and weaken.

I don't like labels since in today's fast world, they tend to distract from the truth and the whole story...
